section.title: Traceable graph
section.paragraph: The source listing below displays a traceable-graph directive:
The directive shown above gives the following output:

graphviz.code: // Traceable relationships digraph "Traceable relationships" { rankdir=LR graph [fontname=helvetica fontsize=7.5] node [fontname=helvetica fontsize=7.5] edge [fontname=helvetica fontsize=7.5] AQUILA [label=Aquila shape=box] AURIGA [label=Auriga shape=box] CEPHEUS [label=Cepheus shape=box] CORVUS [label=Corvus shape=box] CYGNUS [label=Cygnus shape=box] LACERTA [label=Lacerta shape=box] LYRA [label=Lyra shape=box] PEGASUS [label=Pegasus shape=box] SAGITTA [label=Sagitta shape=box] VULPECULA [label=Vulpecula shape=box] AQUILA -> SAGITTA [headlabel=children labelfontcolor="#999999" labelfontsize=7.0 taillabel=parents] AURIGA -> CEPHEUS [headlabel=children labelfontcolor="#999999" labelfontsize=7.0 taillabel=parents] CORVUS -> AQUILA [headlabel=children labelfontcolor="#999999" labelfontsize=7.0 taillabel=parents] CYGNUS -> AQUILA [headlabel=children labelfontcolor="#999999" labelfontsize=7.0 taillabel=parents] LACERTA -> PEGASUS [headlabel=children labelfontcolor="#999999" labelfontsize=7.0 taillabel=parents] LYRA -> SAGITTA [headlabel=children labelfontcolor="#999999" labelfontsize=7.0 taillabel=parents] PEGASUS -> AURIGA [headlabel=children labelfontcolor="#999999" labelfontsize=7.0 taillabel=parents] VULPECULA -> CYGNUS [headlabel=children labelfontcolor="#999999" labelfontsize=7.0 taillabel=parents] }

section.title: Traceable graph
section.paragraph: The source listing below displays a traceable-graph directive:
The directive shown above gives the following output:

graphviz.code: // Traceable relationships digraph "Traceable relationships" { rankdir=LR graph [fontname=helvetica fontsize=7.5] node [fontname=helvetica fontsize=7.5] edge [fontname=helvetica fontsize=7.5] CAELUM [label=Caelum shape=box] CIRCINUS [label=Circinus shape=box] FORNAX [label=Fornax shape=box] NORMA [label=Norma shape=box] CIRCINUS -> FORNAX [headlabel=input labelfontcolor="#999999" labelfontsize=7.0 taillabel="used-in"] FORNAX -> CAELUM [headlabel="created-in" labelfontcolor="#999999" labelfontsize=7.0 taillabel=output] NORMA -> CIRCINUS [headlabel="created-in" labelfontcolor="#999999" labelfontsize=7.0 taillabel=output] }
